original_text: “‘Then at the entrance to the tent of meeting, the Nazirite must shave off the hair that symbolizes their dedication. They are to take the hair and put it in the fire that is under the sacrifice of the fellowship offering.
korean_text: 자기의 몸을 구별한 나실인은 회막 문에서 자기의 머리털을 밀고 그것을 화목제물 밑에 있는 불에 둘지며

sentences.original_text: Then at the entrance to the tent of meeting,
the Nazirite must shave off the hair
They are to take the hair
and put it in the fire
that is under the sacrifice of the fellowship offering.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 불은 교제 제물 아래에 있습니다.
